title: Laurens ten Dam’s Advice for the Dutch Gravel World Champs Team? ‘Be Loose, Have Fun, Still Win’
content:
As the coach of the Dutch national team, Ten Dam has superstars like Van der Poel and Vos in the running for the rainbow stripes this weekend. But he wants them to enjoy the spirit of gravel along the way.

Read the full article at Laurens ten Dam’s Advice for the Dutch Gravel World Champs Team? ‘Be Loose, Have Fun, Still Win’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
